hover.dfwaypoints.info.create.name: Waypoint Name:
message.dfwaypoints.error.create.not_on_: You must be on a plot to create waypoints!
message.dfwaypoints.error.create.waypoin: You already have a waypoint with this name!
message.dfwaypoints.error.create.could_n: DFWaypoints ran into an issue saving waypoint data. Your waypoint has been created, but may not save upon closing the game.
message.dfwaypoints.error.list.not_on_pl: You must be on a plot to list your waypoints!
message.dfwaypoints.error.delete.not_on_: You must be on a plot to delete waypoints!
message.dfwaypoints.error.delete.could_n: DFWaypoints ran into an issue saving waypoint data. Your waypoint has been deleted, but may not save upon closing the game.
message.dfwaypoints.error.teleport.not_o: You must be on a plot to teleport to waypoints!
message.dfwaypoints.error.teleport.not_i: You must be in dev/build mode to teleport to waypoints!
message.dfwaypoints.error.appearance.not: You must be on a plot to edit the appearance of waypoints!
